generate_insight.title: Generate insight
generate_insight.error: We're sorry, but unfortunately we were unable to generate an Insight, please check your internet connection or try again later
generate_insight.prompt: Analyze the performance of a human service operation's results dashboard. The dashboard displays three main categories: calls in progress, closed and waiting. In addition, evaluate the following metrics: first response time, waiting time and interaction time. Identify efficiency patterns, possible bottlenecks in the service flow and offer suggestions for optimizing response time and team productivity. Data: {values}
